verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%>, of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that were in <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>:

To whom the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H526>Amon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, in the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign<s%>.

It came also in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, unto the <S%H8552>end<s%> of the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, unto the carrying <S%H1540>away<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1540>captive<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>.
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

<S%H2962>Before<s%> I <S%H3335>formed<s%> you in the <S%H990>belly<s%> I <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3318>you<s%>; and before you came forth out of the <S%H7358>womb<s%> I <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H5414>you<s%>, and I ordained you a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> unto the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H162>I<s%>, Ah, <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>! <S%H3045>behold<s%>, I cannot <S%H1696>speak<s%>: for I am a <S%H5288>child<s%>.

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H559>me<s%>, Say <S%H5288>not<s%>, I am a child: for you shall <S%H3212>go<s%> to all that I shall <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H6680>you<s%>, and whatever I command you you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%>.
Be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of their <S%H6440>faces<s%>: for I am with you to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H5002>you<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H5060>touched<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>. And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5414>me<s%>, Behold, I have put my <S%H1697>words<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

<S%H7200>See<s%>, I have this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6485>set<s%> you over the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and over the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>, to root <S%H5428>out<s%>, and to pull <S%H5422>down<s%>, and to <S%H6>destroy<s%>, and to throw <S%H2040>down<s%>, to <S%H1129>build<s%>, and to <S%H5193>plant<s%>.

Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying, <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, what <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H559>you<s%>? And I said, I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H4731>rod<s%> of a almond <S%H8247>tree<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> unto <S%H3190>me<s%>, You have well <S%H7200>seen<s%>: for I will <S%H8245>hasten<s%> my <S%H1697>word<s%> to perform <S%H6213>it<s%>.

And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto me the second <S%H8145>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H559>you<s%>? And I said, I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H5301>seething<s%> <S%H5518>pot<s%>; and the <S%H6440>face<s%> there is <S%H6440>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%>.
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6828>me<s%>, Out of the north a <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall break <S%H6605>forth<s%> upon all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

<S%H7121>For<s%>, behold, I will call all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and they shall <S%H935>come<s%>, and they shall <S%H5414>set<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> at the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and against all the <S%H2346>walls<s%> there round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and against all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

And I will <S%H1696>utter<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%> against them <S%H5921>touching<s%> all their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>, who have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H6999>me<s%>, and have burned incense unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of their own <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

You therefore clothe <S%H247>up<s%> your <S%H4975>body<s%>, and <S%H6965>arise<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto them all that I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H2865>you<s%>: be not dismayed at their <S%H6440>faces<s%>, lest I <S%H2865>confound<s%> you before <S%H6440>them<s%>.

<S%H589>For<s%>, behold, I have <S%H5414>made<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, and a <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H5982>pillar<s%>, and <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H2346>walls<s%> against the whole <S%H776>land<s%>, against the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, against the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H3548>there<s%>, against the priests <S%H5971>there<s%>, and against the people of the <S%H776>land<s%>.
And they shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H3201>you<s%>; but they shall not prevail against <S%H5002>you<s%>; for I am with you, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, to deliver <S%H5337>you<s%>.
